titles.title: University of the District of Columbia Equal Educational Status Act of 1999

To amend part B of title III of the Higher Education Act of 1965 to repeal the specific limitation on the eligibility of the University of the District of Columbia for assistance for Historically Black Colleges and Universities.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Postsecondary Education, Training and Life-Long Learning.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and the Workforce

committee.subcommittee: Postsecondary Education, Training and Life-Long Learning
committee.name: House Education and the Workforce

bill.summary: 2/2/1999--Introduced. University of the District of Columbia Equal Educational Status Act of 1999 - Amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 (HEA) to repeal a specified restriction on the eligibility of the University of the District of Columbia for assistance for Historically Black Colleges and Universities, under HEA title III part B.
